section8.title: Lirisoft
section8.description: Since our founding in 2017, Lirisoft has specialized in IT consulting and software development. We empower non-IT organizations and software companies to enhance business performance and rapidly attract new customers.

section2.heading: About Us
section2.description: Founded in 2017, Lirisoft has been a provider of IT consulting and software development services. We have helped non-IT organizations and software product companies improve business performance and quickly win new customers.
listItems: Help you create and manage any process for your business needs.
Improve your business performance, optimize customer service, and tap into digital transformation.
Expertise in Messaging, VoIP, Automation, Internet of Things and Computer Vision technologies.

services.additionalDetails: Generative AI Services help businesses automate tasks and generate insights using AI.

services.name: Data Science Consulting
services.details: Our Data Science Consulting services empower businesses to extract actionable insights from their data. We use advanced analytics, machine learning, and predictive modeling to help you make data-driven decisions.
services.additionalDetails: We specialize in building custom data pipelines, dashboards, and AI models tailored to your business needs.

services.name: Solution Development And Evolution
services.details: We provide end-to-end solution development services, from initial concept to deployment and beyond. Our team ensures your solutions evolve with your business needs.
services.additionalDetails: Our expertise includes cloud integration, microservices architecture, and continuous delivery pipelines.

services.name: End-To-End Solution Development
services.details: Our End-To-End Solution Development services cover every stage of the software lifecycle. From ideation to deployment, we ensure your product meets the highest standards.
services.additionalDetails: We focus on scalability, performance, and user experience to deliver solutions that grow with your business.

services.name: Data Science Research
services.details: Our Data Science Research services explore innovative ways to leverage data for your business. We conduct in-depth research to uncover new opportunities and optimize existing processes.
services.additionalDetails: Our team specializes in natural language processing, computer vision, and advanced statistical modeling.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: At Lirisoft, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
content: We may collect the following types of information:
list: Personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and company details when you fill out forms or contact us.
Technical data such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system through cookies and analytics tools.
Usage data, including pages visited, time spent on the site, and other interaction details.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
list: To provide and improve our services.
To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.
To send you updates, newsletters, and promotional materials (if you have opted in).
To analyze website usage and improve user experience.

sections.heading: 3. Sharing Your Information
content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with:
list: Service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering services.
Legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights and safety.

sections.heading: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

sections.heading: 5. Data Security
content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

sections.heading: 6. Your Rights
content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@lirisoft.com.

sections.heading: 7. Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

sections.heading: 8. Contact Us
content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

contact.address: 1660, 18th Cross Rd, MC Layout, Vijayanagar, Bengaluru

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service

sections.heading: 1. Use of Our Services
sections.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You must not use our website to engage in any illegal or harmful activities.

sections.heading: 2. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Lirisoft and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content without our prior written consent.

sections.heading: 3. User Accounts
sections.content: If you create an account on our website, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.heading: 4. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Lirisoft is not liable for any damages resulting from your use of our website or services. We provide our services 'as is' without any warranties of any kind.

sections.heading: 5. Changes to These Terms
sections.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

TermsOfService.title2: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

contact.address: 1660, 18th Cross Rd, MC Layout, Vijayanagar, Bengaluru
